title: Reservation Executive Job at Club Concierge Africa
content:
Club Concierge Africa is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Reservation Executive
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Reservation Executive will be responsible for managing customer bookings and travel reservations for flights, hotels, tours, and other travel-related services.
	This role involves providing excellent customer service, ensuring accuracy in reservation details, maintaining up-to-date knowledge of travel products and services, and supporting the sales and operations teams in delivering a seamless travel experience.


Key Responsibilities


	Handle and process customer travel inquiries and reservations via phone, email, or online platforms.
	Book flights, accommodation, tour packages, transfers, and other travel services.
	Coordinate with travel vendors, airlines, hotels, and internal departments to confirm bookings.
	Resolve booking-related issues, cancellations, amendments, and rebookings.
	Maintain high levels of customer satisfaction and provide post-booking support as required.
	Provide customers with travel options, pricing, and booking recommendations based on their needs.
	Issue tickets, vouchers, and travel documentation accurately and in a timely manner.
	Ensure all bookings are accurately documented and updated in the reservation system.
	Keep up-to-date with industry trends, airline fare rules, and promotional offers.
	Support sales and marketing campaigns with reservation logistics and data reporting.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application / CV to: career@clubconcierge.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Content & PR Associate Job at Club Concierge Africa
content:
Club Concierge Africa is an African travel and hospitality conglomerate specializing in packaged travel and resort destinations across Africa, Europe, and the Americas.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content & PR Associate

Job Location: Lagos

Responsibilities
Content Development and Strategy:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Content Creation: Develop high-quality, engaging, and on-brand content for blogs, social media, newsletters, press releases, website pages, and marketing collateral.
	Editorial Calendar Management: Maintain a consistent content publishing schedule aligned with marketing campaigns and key brand moments.
	Storytelling: Craft compelling narratives that communicate our value proposition, customer stories, and brand experience across multiple channels.


Public Relations and Media Outreach:


	PR Strategy Execution: Develop and execute PR plans that align with business goals and position Club Concierge and associated companies as thought leaders in the premium travel and concierge services space.
	Media Relations: Build and maintain strong relationships with journalists, bloggers, influencers, and media houses across relevant sectors.
	Press Materials: Write and distribute press releases, media kits, and briefing documents to secure coverage in premium publications and online platforms.
	Monitoring & Reporting: Track media coverage and report on PR outcomes, including reach, engagement, and sentiment analysis.


Brand Communications:


	Messaging Consistency: Ensure brand tone, messaging, and voice remain consistent across all communications and channels.
	Internal Communications: Support internal communications efforts, such as company announcements, employee spotlights, and newsletters.
	Partnership Support: Develop content to support brand collaborations, influencer partnerships, and cross-promotional campaigns.


Social and Digital Content Collaboration:


	Social Content Support: Collaborate with the digital marketing team to repurpose PR stories into engaging social media content.
	SEO Alignment: Incorporate SEO best practices into all written content to maximize search discoverability and organic reach.


Market and Audience Insights:


	Audience Understanding: Leverage data and feedback to tailor content and messaging to different audience segments.
	Industry Trends: Stay up to date with lifestyle, travel, and hospitality trends to inform content strategy and uncover media opportunities.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 3 - 5 years of experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@clubconcierge.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Project Manager Job at Club Concierge Africa
content:
Club Concierge Africa is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Project Manager to lead and oversee strategic initiatives across our travel and hospitality operations.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, exceptional organizational skills, and a passion for travel and customer experience.
	This role requires cross-functional coordination, clear communication, and a results-driven approach to ensure timely and cost-effective delivery of high-quality services.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, execute, and monitor projects across departments including operations, marketing, product development, and client services.
	Define project scope, goals, timelines, and deliverables in collaboration with stakeholders.
	Coordinate internal resources and third-party vendors for seamless execution of travel and hospitality initiatives.
	Identify and mitigate potential risks and issues that may impact project success.
	Communicate project status, updates, and potential roadblocks to senior management and stakeholders.
	Develop detailed project plans, track progress, and adjust plans as needed to meet goals.
	Ensure compliance with budget, quality, and schedule expectations.
	Conduct post-project evaluations and implement continuous improvement strategies.
	Foster a collaborative environment and ensure client satisfaction remains a core focus throughout all project phases.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with at least 5 years of experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications / CV to: career@clubconcierge.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
